description: Great for technical outerwear, like GORE-TEX® jackets, this cleaner helps maintain a garment's water repellency and breathabilty. This high-concentration G-Wash has the same cleaning and odour-killing qualities as the original formula but now goes further.Cleans up to ten wash loads.Biodegradable formula, contains no UV brighteners, whiteners, or perfumes.300ml bottle.
name: Grangers Performance Wash 300ml
